name: Stalemate yourself
description:
A short puzzlescript game about trying to get into a situation where you can't do any actions.

Mobile friendly version:  https://www.puzzlescript.net/play.html?p=b92a2c0fb94f908f5be90df9e60be83e

Source code: https://www.puzzlescript.net/editor.html?hack=b92a2c0fb94f908f5be90df9e60be83e

(Part of my daily puzzlescript creations. Visit my page for more or go here: https://itch.io/c/337780/my-puzzlescript-games)
